name: mikroe.click.calypso
short_description: Calypso Click is a compact add-on board for wireless connectivity in embedded applications. This board features the WIRL-WIFS Calypso WLAN module (2610011025000) from WÃ¼rth Elektronik, which supports IEEE 802.11 b/g/n standards and includes a fully integrated TCP/IP stack. It also features edge castellated connections, a smart antenna configuration, and supports both IPv4 and IPv6 protocols, including SNTP, DHCP, mDNS, HTTP(S), and MQTT, offering secure connectivity with six simultaneous secure sockets, secure boot, and OTA updates.
